div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 452px; height: 1px; padding-top: 57px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
apiVersion: certificates.k8s.io/v1
kind: CertificateSigningRequestmetadata:
name: cert-req-1
spec:
signerName: clusterissuers.cert-manager.io/my-cluster-issuer
request: |
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----
...
-----END CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 22px; margin-left: 162px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 332px; height: 1px; padding-top: 707px; margin-left: 63px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
apiVersion: certificates.k8s.io/v1kind: CertificateSigningRequest
metadata:
name: cert-req-1
status:
conditions:
- type: Approved
status: "True"
reason: policy.cert-manager.io
certificate: | -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
(leaf)
-----END CERTIFICATE-----
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
(intermediate)
-----END CERTIFICATE-----

apiVersion: certificates.k8s.io/v1kind: CertificateSigningRequest
metadata:
name: cert-req-1
status:
conditions:
- type: Approved
status: "True"
reason: policy.cert-manager.io

div.div:
Generate a Certificate using the CertificateRequest as input
⚠️the public key is the only certificate attribute that is guaranteed to match the request
